content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":13441,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ご機嫌でしたね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"You seemed to be in a good mood...\""},{"lineNumber":13442,"originalJapaneseLine":"「酔ってたんだろ。ほっとけ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"He was drunk, wasn’t he? Leave him alone.\""},{"lineNumber":13443,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はーい、パパイアお姉さんだよー。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Heeey, it’s big sister Papaya here.\""},{"lineNumber":13444,"originalJapaneseLine":"　実験開始といこうか」","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's get the experiment started.\""},{"lineNumber":13445,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"......................\""},{"lineNumber":13446,"originalJapaneseLine":"「っ……！　お、あ、パパイア様ッ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...! O-oh, Lady Papaya...\""},{"lineNumber":13447,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、お疲れ様ですッ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"G-good work!\""},{"lineNumber":13448,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んー。こんちは」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm. Hello there.\""},{"lineNumber":13449,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………ふぅ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Phew...\""},{"lineNumber":13450,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだ、あれもゼスのえらいさんか？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What, is that also someone important from Zeth?\""},{"lineNumber":13451,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ゼスは華やかで羨ましいね」","translatedEnglishLine":"Zeth sure is glamorous, I’m jealous.\""},{"lineNumber":13452,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とんでもないっ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Absolutely not...\""},{"lineNumber":13453,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あ、あの方は、元四天王……パパイア様だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"That person is a former of the Four Heavenly Kings... Lady Papaya.\""},{"lineNumber":13454,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ見えて、とんでもない行状で","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Despite appearances, her behavior was outrageous,"},{"lineNumber":13455,"originalJapaneseLine":"　王様に地位を追われた……恐ろしい方なのっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"and the king stripped her of her position... she’s terrifying...\""},{"lineNumber":13456,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ……今でも夢に見る……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... I still see it in my dreams..."},{"lineNumber":13457,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あの塔の片付け……ぐ、うぶっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"cleaning up that tower... ugh, ugh...\""},{"lineNumber":13458,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんと……あっ、そのパパイア殿が……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What... that Lady Papaya...\""},{"lineNumber":13459,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":13460,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぃ、やーーーーっほ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-yay—hello!\""},{"lineNumber":13461,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おわああああぁぁぁっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Waaahhhh!\""},{"lineNumber":13462,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃああぁぅっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kyaaah!?\""},{"lineNumber":13463,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達の背後から、","translatedEnglishLine":"From behind Lance and the others,"},{"lineNumber":13464,"originalJapaneseLine":"パパイアは二人の股間を鷲掴みにした。","translatedEnglishLine":"Papaya grabbed both of them firmly by their crotches."},{"lineNumber":13465,"originalJapaneseLine":"「誰だ、って……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Who do you think it is...\""},{"lineNumber":13466,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前かパパイア！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It’s you, Papaya!\""},{"lineNumber":13467,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やっほー、ランスにもこもこちゃん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yah-hoo, Lance and Mokomoko-chan."},{"lineNumber":13468,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ご無沙汰〜」","translatedEnglishLine":"Long time no see~\""},{"lineNumber":13469,"originalJapaneseLine":"「パパイアさん……！　お久しぶりです！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lady Papaya...! It’s been a long time!\""},{"lineNumber":13470,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うんうん。なんかお姉さん、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah yeah. Somehow it feels like I haven’t seen you in over ten years.\""},{"lineNumber":13471,"originalJapaneseLine":"　十年以上ぶりみたいな気分だよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It really feels like more than ten years.\""},{"lineNumber":13472,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その久しぶりの挨拶がそれか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is that your way of greeting after such a long time?\""},{"lineNumber":13473,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まぁまぁ。ランスもご無沙汰じゃないの。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, well. Lance, you haven’t been around much either."},{"lineNumber":13474,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それでね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"So...\""},{"lineNumber":13475,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うぅむ……総統殿は元より、シィル殿にまで","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm... not only the generalissimo, but even Sir Seale,"},{"lineNumber":13476,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あのような……確かに恐ろしい行状……","translatedEnglishLine":"had to endure such... truly terrifying behavior...\""},{"lineNumber":13477,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あれ……？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uh, huh...?"},{"lineNumber":13478,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いや、もっとアレだったはずだが……","translatedEnglishLine":"No, I thought it was even worse than that..."},{"lineNumber":13479,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんか、雰囲気が……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"The atmosphere is somehow... different?\""},{"lineNumber":13480,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふーん。そっちのそのハイパーくんは","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph. Is that Hyper-kun over there still as lively as ever?\""},{"lineNumber":13481,"originalJapaneseLine":"　相変わらず元気なのかなー？」","translatedEnglishLine":"I wonder if he’s still full of energy?\""},{"lineNumber":13482,"originalJapaneseLine":"「色々聞いてるわよー。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I’ve been hearing various things."},{"lineNumber":13483,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ムスコがたーくさん息子作ったんだって？","translatedEnglishLine":"I hear Musuko has made so many sons?"},{"lineNumber":13484,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ああ、娘もか」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, and daughters too.\""},{"lineNumber":13485,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前、下ネタ多すぎ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You tell too many dirty jokes!\""},{"lineNumber":13486,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城付近のオープンテラス――","translatedEnglishLine":"Near Lance Castle, on the open terrace—"},{"lineNumber":13487,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はー、生き返るーーー……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ahhh, feels like I’m coming back to life...\""},{"lineNumber":13488,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちょっとパパイア。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, Papaya."},{"lineNumber":13489,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そんなだらしなく伸びないの」","translatedEnglishLine":"Don’t stretch out so lazily.\""},{"lineNumber":13490,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、ビビラブラケーキ、こっちです」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, Bibira Love Cake, this way.\""},{"lineNumber":13491,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それにしてもパパイア。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even so, Papaya."},{"lineNumber":13492,"originalJapaneseLine":"　何か用なの？　突然呼び出して……」","translatedEnglishLine":"What do you want? Suddenly calling me here...\""},{"lineNumber":13493,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んーん？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm?\""},{"lineNumber":13494,"originalJapaneseLine":"　徹夜明けでさっき起きたから、","translatedEnglishLine":"I just woke up after an all-nighter,"},{"lineNumber":13495,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ごはん食べたいなーって」","translatedEnglishLine":"and thought I want to eat some food.\""},{"lineNumber":13496,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……私、夕方にはゼスに戻るからね？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I’ll be heading back to Zeth by evening, okay?\""},{"lineNumber":13497,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だから今しかないんじゃない」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That’s why now is the only time.\""},{"lineNumber":13498,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それは……うん、まぁ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well... yeah, I guess.\""},{"lineNumber":13499,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ウルザも疲れが溜まってたみたいだったしー？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Urza seemed pretty tired too, right?"},{"lineNumber":13500,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ちょっとくらい、ね」","translatedEnglishLine":"So just a little bit won’t hurt.\""}]}

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You seemed to be in a good mood..."
"He was drunk, wasn’t he? Leave him alone."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はーい、パパイアお姉さんだよー。
「なんだ、あれもゼスのえらいさんか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What, is that also someone important from Zeth?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスは華やかで羨ましいね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zeth sure is glamorous, I’m jealous."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あ、あの方は、元四天王……パパイア様だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That person is a former of the Four Heavenly Kings... Lady Papaya."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ見えて、とんでもない行状で
王様に地位を追われた……恐ろしい方なのっ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the king stripped her of her position... she’s terrifying..."
"Ah... I still see it in my dreams...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの塔の片付け……ぐ、うぶっ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: cleaning up that tower... ugh, ugh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんと……あっ、そのパパイア殿が……」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From behind Lance and the others,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パパイアは二人の股間を鷲掴みにした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Papaya grabbed both of them firmly by their crotches.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やっほー、ランスにもこもこちゃん。
「パパイアさん……！　お久しぶりです！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lady Papaya...! It’s been a long time!"
"Yeah yeah. Somehow it feels like I haven’t seen you in over ten years."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 十年以上ぶりみたいな気分だよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It really feels like more than ten years."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その久しぶりの挨拶がそれか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is that your way of greeting after such a long time?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まぁまぁ。ランスもご無沙汰じゃないの。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, well. Lance, you haven’t been around much either.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うぅむ……総統殿は元より、シィル殿にまで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... not only the generalissimo, but even Sir Seale,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あのような……確かに恐ろしい行状……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: had to endure such... truly terrifying behavior..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、もっとアレだったはずだが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, I thought it was even worse than that...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふーん。そっちのそのハイパーくんは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph. Is that Hyper-kun over there still as lively as ever?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 相変わらず元気なのかなー？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wonder if he’s still full of energy?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ムスコがたーくさん息子作ったんだって？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I hear Musuko has made so many sons?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城付近のオープンテラス――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Near Lance Castle, on the open terrace—
"Ahhh, feels like I’m coming back to life..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなだらしなく伸びないの」
「あ、ビビラブラケーキ、こっちです」
何か用なの？　突然呼び出して……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What do you want? Suddenly calling me here..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 徹夜明けでさっき起きたから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I just woke up after an all-nighter,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ごはん食べたいなーって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and thought I want to eat some food."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……私、夕方にはゼスに戻るからね？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I’ll be heading back to Zeth by evening, okay?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だから今しかないんじゃない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That’s why now is the only time."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ウルザも疲れが溜まってたみたいだったしー？

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So just a little bit won’t hurt."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Near Lance Castle, on the open terrace—

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I just woke up after an all-nighter,
